General.Name: Top Builders Capital Bhd
General.Description: Top Builders Capital Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the civil and building construction activities in Malaysia. It designs, engineers, and constructs infrastructure components, including piling, foundation, bridges, and buildings. It also engages in manufacturing and sales of prefabricated building systems; rental of plant, machinery, and equipment; and property management activities. The company was formerly known as Ikhmas Jaya Group Berhad and changed its name to Top Builders Capital Berhad in September 2020. Top Builders Capital Berhad was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
